00021 #include "ExceptionBaseTest.h"

00023 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions;
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;

00026 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( ExceptionTest );
00027 
00028 void ExceptionTest::setUp()
00029 {
00030 }

00032 void ExceptionTest::tearDown()
00033 {

00036 void ExceptionTest::testCreate()
00037 {
00038         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException* ex = new CalvinException();
00039 
00040         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ex != NULL );
00041 
00042         delete ex;
00043         ex = NULL;
00044 
00045         ex = new CalvinException(L"Calvin",L"This is a CPPUnitTest",DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,1234);
00046         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ex != NULL );
00047         delete ex;
00048 
00049         std::wstring datetime = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString();
00050         std::string file = __FILE__;
00051         u_int16_t line = (u_int16_t)__LINE__;
00052         u_int64_t code = 1234;
00053         std::wstring source = L"Calvin";
00054         std::wstring desc = L"This tests the throw";
00055 
00056         try
00057         {
00058                 CalvinException exception(source,desc,datetime,file,line,code);
00059                 throw exception;
00060         }
00061         catch(CalvinException& cex)
00062         {
00063                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.Source().compare(source) == 0);
00064                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.Description().compare(desc) == 0);
00065                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.TimeStamp().compare(datetime) == 0);
00066                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.ErrorCode() == code);
00067                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.LineNumber() == line);
00068                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cex.SourceFile().compare(file) == 0);
00069         }
00070 }
00071 void ExceptionTest::testToString()
00072 {
00073         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException ex;
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ex.ToString().compare(L"Not implemented yet.") == 0 );
00075 }
